website_summaries.verdict: This slim, lightweight watch was designed with runners in mind, although it can track cycling and swimming metrics, too.
pros: Tracks time, distance, and pace on a large, high-resolution display
Shows detailed running, cycling, and swimming metrics
Vibration alerts for milestones, laps, and interval alerts
Uses GPS and GLONASS satellite receiver technology
cons: Does not register swimming workouts very well

website_summaries.verdict: TomTom Multi-Sport GPS Watch for triathletes tracks running, swimming, and bicycling, indoors and out. It's not as cutting edge as some products that include strapless heart rate monitoring, but it's a good device with a fantastic design.
cons: Watch strap may flap in the pool
No built-in, strapless heart-rate monitor (chest strap costs extra)
Difficulty connecting to MapMyFitness account in testing

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed with the first use. Then ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the first use. Then I was travelling for 10 days and did not charge the watch while away. It "died" but I guess it's acceptable. Therefore recharge it and sync to my laptop and all data restored. Now I realize that when the phone is left to idle awhile, after pressing the button. It does not response. After a few second, the following message appear. "Bluetooth version 0000 detected Bluetooth version 0004 or higher required" Can somebody from TOMTOM explain? My firmware version is 1.8.25
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ong

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and seems to be pretty accurate. I have never owned a Garmin so I cannot compare the two, but as this is my first GPS watch I would highly recommend it. Battery life is good, and it fits well on the wrist. I have used it for all three sports. I had also read some reviews that said it takes forever to connect, but I have not had that at all. It connects very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch.. just used it for a couple weeks now. The GPS didnt worked well untill I installed the GPS update, but from there works smoothly.. The app is as good as any other ones, but didnt pair with my old Runtastic account (as mentioned elsewhere on the description)
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: First GPS watch
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried other watches however this one does all I need. I can get HR for my runs and bike rides and getting to see my progress post on the Tom Tom software and Map My Fitness site is helpful. When I'm in the pool I have it buzz when I hit my goals for that days swims. As I progress I am starting to see how some of the advanced features will be helpful. It feels good in and out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Morden III

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Advertisement... Battery Problem
customer_reviews.text: I just came back from Japan and using the new watch in one of the marathon there. I fully charged the watch the night before the marathon. But it only last for 4 hours and the watch was out of battery. I can't return the watch because it is out of the return window. I don't think I will use this watch again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND - perfect gift for runners!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for don as gift. He is a runner and absolutely LOVES it! Definitely recommend, interfaces with computer and does all kinds of things.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: When it works its Good, it doesn't always work though
customer_reviews.text: It is a promising product at a good price but is it ready for general release? I feel like a beta tester. The problem is it often doesn't work correctly. The swim feature is almost useless, sometimes it counts laps, sometimes it doesn't. It has worked most of the time for run and bike but when it doesn't feel like it you're out of luck, it just either freezes up or decides to do its own thing. Hopefully i can return this and try something else.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great all around watch, runkeeper integration is great!
customer_reviews.text: GPS works great. Integration to runkeeper website for uploading activities a breeze. Works great for tracking basic swimming. The screen is great, easy to read and the interface is very intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Manolo Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Best you can get,for the$
customer_reviews.text: What a great product, works well and easy to setup
customer_reviews.author: don r.hieronimus

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice, but broke quickly with light use.
customer_reviews.text: Generally an OK product, but about two weeks after I got it the ring around the GPS sensor - which acts as the sole button that controls the watch's functions - broke off, rendering it useless. I didn't even get to use it much, and certainly didn't do anything that should result in breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ruby

customer_reviews.title: good watch and heart rate monitor
customer_reviews.text: the watch has a nice large display and the information it give you is clear. The heart rate monitor is a little particular about positioning, but once you get it correct it has no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bolooza

customer_reviews.title: Very disaponting
customer_reviews.text: I have only for 2 month. and the left navigation key doesn't work. It seems that also GPS doen't work. Very disaponting. Regards Yosi
customer_reviews.author: Yosi Naveh

customer_reviews.title: Thewatch works pretty well and is fairly accurate
customer_reviews.text: The watch works pretty well and is fairly accurate. The app does not work well when it comes to blue tooth data transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swim mode is poor
customer_reviews.text: Good watch. Works fine for running and cycling but swim function doesn't work in open water (which is what all triathletes need!) and even in the pool I find the swim metrics a little bit off. Hopefully tomtom improves this through an update though. If they do I would give it 4 or maybe even 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: lorenz florendo

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality and very simple
customer_reviews.text: Only a few weeks in and what a great piece of kit. Very simple to get going and using the basic features and syncing data into the TomTom Connect. Haven't started setting training goals on it yet. would def recommend. Does exactly what it says even on treadmill. Cycling and running works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ebs

customer_reviews.title: Brand New and cannot charge it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed, I thought I was buying the best GPS watch and it doesnt work, the battery is not charging.
customer_reviews.author: Matias Saez

customer_reviews.title: I really liked my TomTom
customer_reviews.text: I really liked my TomTom, it's awesome it had all the options you need when you are making your sport. It is very comfortable and didn't buzzer you while you are running or riding your bike ,the battery life is good 2 days or more according to your use. It is really good .
customer_reviews.author: Eman

customer_reviews.title: Everything works fine with the
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine with the watch, but the bike mount strap is flimsy. Broke the first time I tried to put it on. A replacement is $20 which is a rip-off considering it is a piece of plastic and rubber.
customer_reviews.author: neha

customer_reviews.title: is my watch faulty?
customer_reviews.text: After I have completed a workout the watch keeps dying. I plug it into the computer and it is up and running within a minute. However it has dumped all of the time and date data retaining my workouts only. Is there something faulty with my watch or I am doing something wrond?
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Metcalfe

customer_reviews.title: Clearance sale = Short live
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, but after one year usage, the battery is out of juice.
customer_reviews.author: Adham Somantrie

customer_reviews.title: The best thing is that you can store bike rides independently ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as advertised, and info syncs wirelessly to your smartphone or by USB to your computer, stored on TomTom's own "MySports" program and another generic running program of your choice such as MapMyRun. The best thing is that you can store bike rides independently of runs! The more expensive version with the built-in heart monitor might be worth the cost to be able to discard the chest strap/transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!! Website/data connection is a complete FLOP. Sensitive personal information is passed openly. Won't function.
customer_reviews.text: Watch does not connect to the website as it is supposed to. When I try to log in, I am stuck in a redirect loop. I could see from one page that my personal information was being sent through the URL, which is a huge security no-no! The need to fire their entire web team. The platform is not ready for use by any means. UPDATE: 8/31/2014: Watch has completely died and is unresponsive. Will not connect to computer and will not respond to touch on the main button. Am sending this back for a replacement and am NOT optimistic that the replacement will work. 7 months after purchasing I have still not been able to used this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sports watch with multiple uses . Definitely recommend to friends
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice but one major flaw
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this watch but it lacked one very important feature and that is data retrieval for laps. Anyone who does any even semi-serious training measures the training in laps. I want to know my pace and hr on each lap. This watch only tells you how you did on the entire workout. Seems crazy to me as this is pretty basic. The watch grabs the gps signal really fast and keeps it which is great and it is pretty thin which is nice. I am sending it back as the lap thing is a deal killer for me.
customer_reviews.author: EricinDC

customer_reviews.title: Fragile/Weak
customer_reviews.text: After only 18 months of use, the watch button stopped working! :-(
customer_reviews.author: FMS

customer_reviews.title: great watch, i love it
customer_reviews.text: it is a great watch, i use it every day; i shew it to my friends, and they want to buy it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mao Morris Chang

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it on April last year, it worked ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it on April last year, it worked well all these months, but now it does not charge the battery completely and the battery runs out faster than before. In addition, today it gave me wrong information about the exercise I did yesterday (wrong date, wrong time, etc). Please let me know how to proceed Thanks, Paul
customer_reviews.author: Paul Oporta R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I got it last December but keep it for father's day. This watch doesn't work at all. My only chance is to call Tom Tom and see what happen. Disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: marypf

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Do not buy for swimming
customer_reviews.text: This smart watch is useless for swimming. Too bad they didn't test it with a swimmer - I won't even buy a Nike sweat shirt in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D. Rizzi

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch with most features
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch with most features. GPS is good but the battery is poor. Works with polar Bluetooth sensors. No GPS for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: mrkz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it. tons of bugs. doesn't work on an indoor trainer. not well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had the watch for three months now and so far it has worked very well. It displays all the info I'm wanting to track. The only minus is how long the GPS takes to find your location. When I step outside I want to be ready to go but GPS won't locate me while inside my house so I have to do some cold stretching until it's ready. Display is big and easy to read and the GPS even tracks when on trails. Over all it's a good watch.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Battery must be charged daily. Also getting message that ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery must be charged daily. Also getting message that memory is full. Too many functions on this watch. I preferred my old NIKE GPS Heart Rate Monitor watch.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Needs work
customer_reviews.text: I'll get right into the pros/ cons PROS: Large numbers makes it easy to see while playing, biking, running Low profile so it doesn't get beat up during football, ultimate frisbee, or other high contact sports Good looking watch CONS: Software is not very good, I forgot my username and password and am unable to retrieve it because the website neglects to have this...this might be fxed by now. Battery life is HORRIBLE. I can't get through an entire game without it dying on me. In my opinion this is the worst feature. I play and ride for a couple hours and wish this watch could handle that. Maybe it's a lemon but either way...this sucks about the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cortez

customer_reviews.title: TomTom is a BombBomb.  Buy the Garmin 310XT instead.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use for open water swimming, biking, and running. I used it for a triathlon and a workout. I did not use it in a pool. I returned it after several days. It looks great and is comfortable to wear, but...doesn't perform in open water as advertised, is difficult to set up, and is generally disappointing. Compared to its performance and other products available, I cannot recommend this product. To the contrary, I recommend saving some money and getting the Garmin 310XT instead. I do appreciate how easy the return process is at amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bugs
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch nearly a year and every time they update it they introduce more bugs into it. The most recent update has severely impacted battery life and the ability of the watch to accurately give pace. I've gone back to using my RC3 GPS and am looking for a new multisport watch. I love the design here and simplicity but its too unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: David Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor, It got GPS so fast.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor, It got GPS so fast. I do cycling and run, is perfect simple. Bike mount is perfect. With the smartphone application you can sync immediately after to end exercise, also this way enable update of "quickGPS" on the clock. You can sync with strava
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: But it was always a little funny after a swim
customer_reviews.text: This watch worked ok. It was a decent training buddy for a time. But it was always a little funny after a swim. Now the freaking thing doesn't work at all. Use it for the bike and the run but swimming will kill this thing. Also the heart rate monitor causes chest pain after about 10 miles of running. Good if you're kinda casual, not if you're serious.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an enthusiast runner and swimmer. This watch is beautiful, easy to use and fast to reach signal. It could be better maybe If it'd have more options for intervals (more than one type set), and on swim mode I think it'd have a gps for open water(I still don't know how I can use this watch at sea). My main reason to haver one of this is that I can monitor my running and have some information about my fitness whatever I am. It's very cost-effective and simple. Very approved!!
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, easy to use, waterproof, only problem the heart rate monitor strap is stiff at the sensor and chafes. It chafed me no matter my mileage,wearing body glide did not help. Love it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recomended for outside. GPS signal very good
customer_reviews.text: Good for outdoor but for indoor is in trouble sometimes. Very good GPS signal and heart rate
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: this seemed like the best tracker for cycling
customer_reviews.text: After much research, this seemed like the best tracker for cycling. I like how simple, yet how in depth this tracks my cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: incredible watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Enjoy using it with many sports and the heart rate target helps me not over train. Very stylish as a watch too. Like the way it interconnects with my favorite Web trackers. Bluetooth is nice with my iPad too
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Tom tom
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking this model has the heart rate monitor equipped within the devise and not needing the chest strap monitor.
customer_reviews.author: T. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, amazing quality, 100% recommended has a serious error has the simple function of counting the steps without gps activation. if you can count distance treadmill inside your gym but you can not use it for daily counting your steps on the day. the sowtware should give a solution to this issue if you have garmin in all its models. I hope the answer to my criticism manufacturer product. thank you elias
customer_reviews.author: E.D.F.

customer_reviews.title: COOL Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool watch, I swim with it, it tracks how far I have sum and for how long and my carb burn, it also tracks my walking with a gps map of where I have walked, the distance covered the carbs burnt and my heart rate monitored and all recorded back on my computer afterwards
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Spittal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is excellent. The software to support it however lacks some fundamentals.
customer_reviews.author: A Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love the TomTom
customer_reviews.text: Bought the TomTom for my wife. She loves it. It has very good features and works very well. It is also thin and light weight and the GPS acquires its signal faster than My Trainer.
customer_reviews.author: PK

product_meta.title: TomTom Multi-Sport GPS Watch with Heart Rate Monitor, Grey
product_meta.description:
Style:With Heart Rate Monitor| Color:Grey| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingWhether you're running, cycling or swimming, TomTom has a range of GPS watches and accessories to help you achieve your goals. With TomTom Multi-Sport, see your detailed running, cycling, and swimming metrics at-a-glance to stay motivated and reach your running goals.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


TOMTOM MULTISPORT GPS WATCH
SEE MORE. ACHIEVE MORE.
See your detailed running, cycling, and swimming metrics at-a-glance.

 * Track time, distance and pace on an extra-large, high resolution display.
 * Achieve your goals with the help of the TomTom Graphical Training Partner.
 * Navigate easily through menus with the intuitive One-Button Control.

PERFORMANCE AT A GLANCE
Click here for a larger image

EXTRA-LARGE DISPLAY
See your key running stats at-a-glance. View distance, run time and pace on a high-resolution and high-contrast display. 

ONE-BUTTON CONTROL
Navigate easily through menus with the intuitive One-Button Control. Get started quickly and keep moving with easy access to watch functions and your key stats. 

Simply press up-down-left-right to move through menus. 

GRAPHICAL TRAINING PARTNER
Train more effectively with full-screen graphics.

GRAPHICAL TRAINING PARTNER
 * Train more effectively with full-screen graphics. 
 * View your training performance at-a-glance with three unique graphical training modes.
 * Race yourself, challenge yourself or pace yourself to get the most out of your run.

RACE
Race yourself: Compare your current run with past performances. See in “real-time” where you are compared to your best or last run so you can continue to improve, run after run.

GOAL
Challenge yourself: See that you are on track to achieve your goals. Set a distance, time or calorie goal and check your progress in a simple full screen graphic.

Set your goal and receive alerts when you’re halfway there, almost there and when you have achieved your goal.

ZONE
Pace yourself: Instantly see if you are in the right training zone. Set a target for pace or heart rate* and see in a simple full screen graphic how you are tracking throughout your run. 

*Heart Rate Monitor, optional accessory

DESIGNED FOR ATHLETES
ULTRA-SLIM DESIGN
Run with a lightweight watch designed for runners. The slim design comfortably fits all wrist sizes.

VIBRATION ALERTS
Stay focused on your run with vibration alerts. Hear beeps and feel vibrations to get milestone, lap and interval alerts, even when listening to your music.

SUPER-TOUGH DISPLAY
Run with a durable, scratch-resistant display. Super-tough scratch and impact-resistant display stays easy to read, run after run.

TRAIN ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
INDOOR TRACKER
Track your run indoors and on a treadmill. The TomTom Runner’s built-in sensors count your strides so you can monitor your pace and distance. No extra foot pod required.

WATERPROOF UP TO 165 FEET (50 METERS) / 5ATM
Run in all kinds of weather. The TomTom Runner is waterproof up to 165 feet (50 meters) / 5ATM and as weather-ready as you are.

QUICKGPSFIX TECHNOLOGY
Get out on your run faster. QuickGPSFix helps your watch find your precise location quickly so you can start your run. 

With the latest in GPS and GLONASS satellite receiver technology, you are sure to get a fast start to your run. 

UP-TO 10 HOUR BATTERY LIFE [GPS MODE]
Run more, recharge less, with up-to 10-hour battery life [GPS Mode].

TRACK YOUR RUN, CYCLE AND SWIM
SWIM SENSOR
Track your swim metrics indoors and out. See your key swimming metrics, including efficiency, strokes, stroke type, lengths, distance and speed.

ALTIMETER*
Monitor your elevation while you ride. The built-in barometric altimeter* accurately tracks your elevation, accent, descent and grade.

*Selected models only

CADENCE/SPEED SENSOR*
Monitor your cadence* as you ride. Measure your peddle strokes in real-time to help you perform at your best. 

Mounts easily to your bike to track your speed and distance, indoors and out.

*optional accessory

BIKE MOUNT
Place your watch in the best position for cycling. Use the specially-designed bike mount to help you easily see your stats at-a-glance. 

CONNECT EASILY
MULTI-PLATFORM COMPATIBILITY
Sync, analyze and share your stats on popular running sites or apps. Easily upload information about your runs to track progress against your goals. 

With compatibility across a broad range of online running community platforms, you can choose where you store your statistics.

DESK DOCK
Charge and sync your watch. The Desk Dock connects to your PC or Mac easily, quickly and reliably. Connect to sensors using the latest wireless technology. The TomTom Runner uses Bluetooth Smart Technology to connect to the TomTom Heart Rate Monitor* and other compatible Bluetooth Smart accessories.

*Heart Rate Monitor Optional accessory

BLUETOOTH SMART CONNECTIVITY
Connect to sensors using the latest wireless technology. The TomTom Multi-Sport uses Bluetooth Smart Technology to connect to the TomTom Heart Rate Monitor*, Cadence Sensor* and other compatible Bluetooth Smart accessories.

*Optional accessory
feature_bullets: Extra Large Display so you can see your key running, cycling and swimming stats at a glance
Graphical training partner helps you train more effectively with full screen graphics and three unique training modes
One button control allows you to easily navigate through menus.
Multi-sport watch tracks running, swimming and cycling metrics at a glance

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
